Stakeholder.definition: a person holding property or owing an obligation that is claimed by two or more adverse claimants and who has no claim to or interest in the property or obligation [the can interplead the claimants] 2

1.definition: a person holding property or owing an obligation that is claimed by two or more adverse claimants and who has no claim to or interest in the property or obligation [the can interplead the claimants]

2.definition: a person having an interest or share in a commercial undertaking
